9 std::string LeicaUtils::findPointcloudFolderPath()
10 {
11  std::string pkg_path = ros::package::getPath("leica_scanstation_utils");
12 
13  std::size_t i = pkg_path.find("leica_scanstation_utils");
14  pkg_path = pkg_path.substr(0,i-1);
15 
16  _pointcloud_path = pkg_path + "/leica_scanstation_utils/pointclouds/";
17  return _pointcloud_path;
18 }

30 std::string LeicaUtils::getFilePath(std::string file_name, std::string extension)
31 {
32  std::string file_path = _pointcloud_path;
33

39 std::string LeicaUtils::getFilePath(std::string file_name, std::string extension, int counter)
40 {
41  std::string file_path = _pointcloud_path;
42  std::string scan_number = std::to_string(counter);
43 
44  file_path += file_name + scan_number + extension;
45 
46  return file_path;
47 }
